function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for lack of mainstream adoption of regenerative development and design","Impact":"Slow progress in addressing environmental and social issues in the built environment","Mitigation":"Promote the engagement and involvement of community members and stakeholders in regenerative practices","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, educational campaigns","People":"Community members, stakeholders","Owner":"Community organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Influence of as yet unknown factors on societal actions","Impact":"Unpredictable changes in societal behavior and decision-making","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring of societal trends and attitudes, flexibility in adaptation strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics, social listening tools","People":"Society at large","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on community behaviors and values","Impact":"Changes in community values and priorities, potential for expedited adoption of regenerative practices","Mitigation":"Encourage reflection on community values and needs, promote sustainable and regenerative initiatives","Technologies":"Online communication platforms, virtual community engagement tools","People":"Community members","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations"}]}
